> 2009/10/15 Jan Algermissen <algermissen1971@...>
>   
> A client doesn't need to know the content type of a GET, as it can ask
> for what it wants.
>   

Is this always the case?

There might be an application context in which an hyperlink should drive 
a client towards a specific representation
